subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Corbett’s tenure as principal owner of the Texas Rangers baseball team brought the franchise Steinbrenner-like hubris and pocketbook diplomacy, but only middling success.
snippet: Mr. Corbett’s tenure as principal owner of the Texas Rangers baseball team brought the franchise Steinbrenner-like hubris and pocketbook diplomacy, but only middling success.
